text: Trisha Paytas is an American actress, media personality, writer, and singer. She has appeared in a wide range of media, ranging from films and television shows to music videos and podcasts. Furthermore, she has release several extended plays and one studio album, as well as nearly 40 singles. Trisha Paytas is best known for her daily YouTube "vlog" videos that have accumulated a total of over 1 billion views.https://www.youtube.com/user/blndsundoll4mj/about Although Paytas has also made a number of television and film appearances, some of her most notable film appearances being in To Get Her (2011), Lola's Love Shack (2013), and her own direct-to-web film Viral Video, while she's had main roles in The Greg Behrendt Show (2006) and Who Wants to Be a Superhero? (2007) and a number of guest appearances in shows such as Modern Family, Huge, Conan, and The Tonight Show with Jay Leno. In late 2014, Paytas had begun a music career with the release of her music video for "Santa Baby", which currently has over a million views on YouTube.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z1mKRJFyry0 Several months later she released her first extended play, Fat Chicks, which was followed by the announcement that it was going to be a visual album. The first music video from the EP was for her cover of Van Halen's "Hot for Teacher".
